item.title: Teresa add a quote by Teresa Reasor
item.description: "I don’t really care if their parents are same sex, lesbian or gay, straight, married, cohabitating, divorced, bi-racial or what. If they love and take care of them, which is basically what all children need and want, I don’t think it matters. -- Breaking Through (Military Romantic Suspense) (Book 2 of the SEAL TEAM Heartbreakers)" -- Teresa Reasor

item.title: Teresa add a quote by Teresa Reasor
item.description: "We send you to awful places and ask you to do things, terrible, painful, necessary things, and then we ask you not to think about it, remember it, or internalize any of it. We ask the impossible." -- Teresa Reasor

item.title: Teresa add a quote by Teresa Reasor
item.description: "You’ve done hard before. If it came easy, it wouldn’t mean as much. -- reaking Free (Military Romantic Suspense) (Book 1 of the SEAL TEAM Heartbreakers)" -- Teresa Reasor
